value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Beyond this gateway is our next stop:
The World of Mystery Renewed!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|New horizons, meeting new Heroes...
I'm trembling with the possibilities!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Sharena... Being courteous—even
warm—toward Heroes is fine. But
don't let yourself get drawn in...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|He's right. Embla has already invaded.
Any Heroes we meet are likely to be
our next opponents. Be on your guard.$k$p$EFace_Cool|It's time to show them what we can
do. We must free the Heroes! Come on.$k$p

$WmMPID_カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Greetings. I am Katarina. I aspire to
become a tactician, so I'm training
with the Altean Knights. $k$pPrincess Veronica holds me bound
by contract, however. I am left with no
choice but to attack.$k$pIf you demonstrate your strength,
I'll be freed. I hate to impose upon
you, but I hope you'll engage me.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I can't thank you enough for breaking
the contract. I'm so glad.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|I am, too! Now that the contract is
taken care of, we can put down our
weapons and become friends.$k$p$WmMPID_カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Friends?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Of course! I hope to become friends
with each and every Hero. We've
already won quite a few over.$k$pWhat do you say?$k$p$WmMPID_カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|How sweet. Nothing would make me
happier.$k$pI have some allies you might want to
meet. They are trapped by the same
contract. I'd love to see them freed...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Well, what are we waiting for? Where
are they?$k$p$WmMPID_カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I'll show you the way. Follow me,
Sharena.$k$p$Sbs150|
